tool_description: Imports and validates document batches from various sources, handling multiple file formats and performing initial quality checks on document integrity and readability.

source_path.description: File system path or network location containing documents to import

supported_formats.description: List of supported file formats to process

batch_size.description: Maximum number of documents to process in a single batch

error_messages: Invalid source path: The specified path does not exist or is not accessible. Verify the path and permissions.
No supported documents found: No files matching the supported formats were found in the source path. Check the file formats and supported_formats parameter.
Batch size too large: Batch size exceeds system limits (max 1000). Reduce the batch_size parameter.
File corruption detected: One or more files are corrupted and cannot be processed. Check the source files for integrity.
usage: Specify the source_path containing documents to import. Optionally configure supported_formats, batch_size, and include_subfolders. The tool validates and organizes documents into processable batches.

batch_id.description: Unique identifier for the imported batch

document_count.description: Total number of documents successfully imported

file_paths.description: List of file paths for all imported documents

import_timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the import was completed

validation_status.description: Overall validation status: passed, failed, or partial
